benchmark_details.name: MAGICMIRROR: A LARGE-SCALE DATASET AND BENCHMARK FOR FINE-GRAINED ARTIFACTS ASSESSMENT IN TEXT-TO-IMAGE GENERATION
benchmark_details.overview: MagicMirror is a comprehensive framework for systematically evaluating physical artifacts in text-to-image generation. It introduces MagicData340K, the first human-annotated large-scale dataset with fine-grained artifact labels, and MagicBench, an automated benchmark for evaluating artifacts in T2I models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a systematic evaluation framework for assessing artifacts in text-to-image generation models.

data.source: MagicData340K - a collection of 340,000 generated image-text pairs annotated with fine-grained artifact labels.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on true positives, false positives, and false negatives across multiple artifact categories.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision and recall indicate better performance in detecting and assessing image artifacts.
methodology.validation: Validation conducted through comparisons with existing models and evaluation on a test set.
